General.Name: Deppon Logistics Co Ltd
General.Description: DEPPON LOGISTICS Co., LTD. operates as a customer-centered logistics company in Mainland China, Japan, South Korea, Europe, America, Southeast Asia, Hong Kong, Macao, and Taiwan, and internationally. It offers express delivery, less-than-truckload transportation, full truck load transportation, and warehousing management services, as well as cross-border and other value-added services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China. DEPPON LOGISTICS Co., LTD. operates as a subsidiary of Ningbo Meishan Baoshui Area Deppon Investment Holding Company Limited.
